turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Martha, are you anywhere near the Starbucks on County Road 42 in Burnsville by the Chick Fil-A?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, I'll be going past there on my way in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, perfect! Can you order a coffee for me and pick it up on the way to work?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. That was hot, right, not iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct, hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah! No whip!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Oh, it's also going to ask what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't care. I guess 2%.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So just to confirm, that's a Grande white chocolate mocha, 2% milk, no whip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right give me a second to get that order placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Your order has been placed and will be ready shortly. You'll get a receipt by text and I'll pick it up on my way in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!! You're the best.
